title: LCD Watch Face - Interactive
summary: LCD Transparent Interactive Watch Face for Android Wear
description: Amazing transparent interactive watch face with LCD display for round and square Android Wear watches. Push the Red Button to see how it works!FEATURES:★ Weather Forecast for more than 74.000 locations★ Auto-detection of current location★ Phone Battery information★ Watch Battery indicator★ Date and Day information★ 12/24 auto-format★ High Resolution Design★ Ambient (dimmed) mode★ Support for Round and Square watchesINSTRUCTION:1. Install Watch Face2. Wait a minute2. Go to Android Wear Application3. Choose LCD Watch Face4. Enjoy!The LCD watchface has been tested on Moto® 360, LG® G Watch R, ASUS® ZenWatch, Sony® SmartWatch and other. Any problems? Please email me and I'll try my best to fix any issues you have!
descriptionHTML:
Amazing transparent interactive watch face with LCD display for round and square Android Wear watches. Push the Red Button to see how it works!

FEATURES:

★ Weather Forecast for more than 74.000 locations
★ Auto-detection of current location
★ Phone Battery information
★ Watch Battery indicator
★ Date and Day information
★ 12/24 auto-format
★ High Resolution Design
★ Ambient (dimmed) mode
★ Support for Round and Square watches

INSTRUCTION:

1. Install Watch Face
2. Wait a minute
2. Go to Android Wear Application
3. Choose LCD Watch Face
4. Enjoy!

The LCD watchface has been tested on Moto® 360, LG® G Watch R, ASUS® ZenWatch, Sony® SmartWatch and other. Any problems? Please email me and I'll try my best to fix any issues you have!
comments: Awesome face I think everyone should have this face! Very easy to use and clear and easy to read!

Great face, but currently unusable on my zenwatch 2 The design is wonderful, but on my zenwatch 2 something is off with the main time display; it appears that the date is on top of the time instead of side by side with it. If fixed it would definitely be a 5 star. UPDATE: The issue seems to have solved itself,  or was fixed in an update. 5 stars!
Almost perfect! I'm with Andrei: I'd love to see a black/white pattern in standby. This face is utterly cool in active mode, but turns pretty plain in standby. Interactive button is genius.

Great watch face My only complaint is that you cannot set it to display the weather in Celsius with the new interactive mode.  Seems to be accurate for my location if I do a Fahrenheit to Celsius conversion.  Otherwise this is a five star watch face for sure.
recentChanges: + Added manual settings for temperature (F/C) and time (12/24) formats
